text:
I had choice to talk about social network, and in particulary Twitter.
For beginning, the first website considerate like an "social network" is SixDegrees.com, appear in 1997. But the explosion of social network be launched in 2003, by MySpace, Facebook (2004) Twitter (2006), and after that, this is the democratisation of social network.
He's create the 21 march 2006 by Alex Dupont, Alex Dupont, Alex Dupont and Alex Dupont. The particularity of this social network is that the number of caracter of ur post, messages or commentaries is limited, of more, is a social network easy at use because, for exemple you can repost a friend post in just 1 click.
 I had choice to talk about this social network in particulary because I find, like the majority of user of Twitter, that it a easier access to information or just an easier access to joke, troll, etc..
I think Twitter is really the best network to access at information but, don't forget that everyone can post who they want and say who they want, so it's important of sorted fake and real informations.
For exemple, actually, a war was beginning in Paris and my principal information source is Twitter, when I woke up, I go on this social network for renseigned myself of the new in the world.
In the same time, the musical artist like Alex Dupont, Alex Dupont and lot of other, use lot Twitter too, so if this artist take a concert music or just exit a new music, I learn this information on Twitter.
It's a cool tool too for follow his friend and, like the people had most facility to tell her stories or her life on this social network, it's more fun.
